name: Best Performance by an Actor in a Leading Role

name: Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role
normalized_name: Best Performance by an Actress in a Leading Role

candidates.notes: At age 85 years and 321 days, Riva is (to date) the oldest ever nominee for the Academy Award for Best Actress. She earned this honor in the same year as the award's youngest ever nominee, Quvenzhané Wallis.

At age 9 years and 135 days, Wallis is (to date) the youngest ever nominee for the Academy Award for Best Actress. She earned this honor in the same year as the award's oldest ever nominee, Emmanuelle Riva.

candidates.notes: For the song "Everybody Needs A Best Friend".

name: Best Achievement in Music Written for Motion Pictures, Original Score
normalized_name: Best Achievement in Music Written for Motion Pictures (Original Score)

candidates.notes: Tied with Paul N.J. Ottosson for Zero Dark Thirty (2012).
Tied with Per Hallberg and Karen Baker Landers for Skyfall (2012).

name: Best Foreign Language Film of the Year

candidates.notes: Brenda Chapman became the first woman to win an Academy Award for Best Animated Feature Film of the Year.
